amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Transportation and any State which raises certain speed limits to prepare and submit to the Congress a safety report concerning the effects of these changes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record to require the Secretary of Transportation and any State which raises certain speed limits to prepare and submit to the Congress a safety report concerning the effects of these changes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
